meanings.definition: A person who writes letters or epistles.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother is an avid epistlers, always sending letters to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The epistlers received a reply to their heartfelt letter.
meanings.sent3: The epistlers at the post office were so busy, they almost ran out of stamps!
meanings.sent4: In the age of emails, the epistlers are like ancient scribes preserving history.
meanings.sent5: The epistlers' penmanship was so elegant, it was like calligraphy.

meanings.definition: The act of writing letters or epistles.
meanings.sent1: The epistlers of the past used quills and ink to write their letters.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the art of epistlers, finding solace in putting her thoughts on paper.
meanings.sent3: The epistlers in the library were so engrossed in their writing, they didn't notice the time passing.
meanings.sent4: His epistlers were like a symphony of words, each letter a note in a beautiful composition.
meanings.sent5: The epistlers' desk was covered in parchment, a testament to their dedication to writing.
